name: Dead heaD
description:
Take control of a specially trained soldier and start hunting for the most notorious terrorist leader in the world... all that in this side-scrolling 2D action shooter....

FEATURES:

*Stylised 2D graphic achieved with ULTRA 2D engine

*Intense shooting action with various tactics

*Various vehicle sections that will test your reflexes and coordination

*Unique story throughout 7 large levels

*Xbox 360 controller support via AntiMicro 2.5...

System req: Win Xp, Vista, Win 7, Win 8/ Graphic card 256Mb/ Dual Core processor 2.0 or better/ 1Gb Ram/ 70Mb Hard Disc free/ Mouse+Keyboard
